name: Yatzy Pocket Scorecard
description:
Allows you to play to the game with no paper.
No need to calculate anything, the app do that for you.
Enter the score easely in touching or dragging the dices on the screen.
Track the highest score ever played on the device.
Track all the game played with the player names.
Support for English, German and French.
Change the background color.
Play up to 3 players.
